info.name: OnlyOffice Callback Interceptor
info.summary: Intercepts OnlyOffice callbacks and redirects them to Django backend
info.description:
This app intercepts OnlyOffice document editing callbacks and redirects them to a Django backend server.
Features: - Automatic callback URL modification to Django endpoint - JWT token signing for secure callbacks - Path-based filtering (only /Data/ directory) - User metadata injection - Health check and automatic fallback - Detailed logging and debug mode - Admin configuration interface
This enables dual-callback architecture where: 1. OnlyOffice sends callbacks to Django for data processing 2. Django forwards callbacks to Nextcloud for file persistence
